#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    int t, i, index;
    char str[101];
    long arr[26];
    long p, q, n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        memset(arr,0,sizeof(arr));
        cin>>str;
        cin>>p>>q;
        for(i=0; str[i]!='\0'; ++i)
        {
            index = str[i]-'a';
            arr[index]++;
        }
        arr[0] *= p;
        for(i=1; i<26; ++i)
        {
            arr[i] *= p;
            arr[i] += arr[i-1];
        }
        while(q--)
        {
            cin>>n;
            if(n>strlen(str)*p)
                cout<<"-1\n";
            else
            {
                for(i=0;i<26; ++i)
                {
                    if(n<=arr[i])
                    {
                        char ch = 'a' + i;
                        cout<<ch<<"\n";
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
        }

    }
    return 0;

}
